scripts.build:all: pnpm run inst:ui && pnpm run build:ui && pnpm inst:color && pnpm build:color && pnpm run inst:site && pnpm run build:site && pnpm run inst:base64 && pnpm run build:base64
scripts.update:all: pnpm run update:ui && pnpm update:color && pnpm --filter=@a-luna/portfolio update && pnpm --filter=@a-luna/svelte-base64 update
scripts.dev:color: pnpm run update:color && pnpm --filter=@a-luna/svelte-color-tools run dev
scripts.dev:site: pnpm run update:site && pnpm --filter=@a-luna/portfolio run dev
scripts.dev:base64: pnpm run update:base64 && pnpm --filter=@a-luna/svelte-base64 run dev
scripts.preview:site: pnpm run update:site && pnpm run build:site && pnpm --filter=@a-luna/portfolio run preview
scripts.preview:base64: pnpm run update:base64 && pnpm run build:base64 && pnpm --filter=@a-luna/svelte-base64 run preview
scripts.deploy:site: NODE_ENV=production && pnpm run iprod:ui && pnpm run build:ui && pnpm run iprod:site && pnpm run bprod:site
scripts.deploy:base64: NODE_ENV=production && pnpm run iprod:ui && pnpm run build:ui && pnpm run iprod:base64 && pnpm run bprod:base64
